name: Lucky Horse Furoshiki, Fire Orange or Ice Blue
description: Our own design, locally screen-printed on silk dupioni. This design is special to us: we're donating a percentage of the proceeds from each to Happy Trails Riding Center in West Linn, Oregon, a chapter of Disabled Sports USA and a PATH accredited therapeutic riding center. Available in fire orange or ice blue, in 20" and 30", and on an 18" pillow, too. (All are washable in cool water.)

name: Lucky Horse Pillow, Fire Orange or Ice Blue
description: Perfect gift for a horse lover, and a way to contribute to a good cause, too.  We're donating a percentage of the proceeds to Happy Trails Riding Center in West Linn, Oregon, a chapter of Disabled Sports USA and a PATH accredited therapeutic riding center for all ages. This is our own design, locally screen printed on silk dupioni. (Each pillow comes with an 18" insert. Both insert and pillow cover are washable.) Available in fire orange or ice blue, and on 20" and 30" furoshiki, too.

options.name: a pair of Ice Blue Pillows
a pair of Fire Orange Pillows
mixed set: one Orange, one Blue Pillow

name: Fire and Ice Silk Furoshiki (large)
description: Crisp and glossy, this handwoven dupioni is incredibly easy to tie and always looks fabulous. Large (forty inches) really is big - enough to wrap a stack of coffee table books, make a gorgeous table drape, or transport two wine bottles in cool safety.  Colors change from time to time; right now you can choose Fire Orange or Ice Blue, both very lux.

name: Fire and Ice Silk Furoshiki (medium)
description: Crisp and glossy, this handwoven dupioni is incredibly easy to tie and always looks fabulous.  Medium (thirty inches) is generous and adaptable - enough to wrap a wine bottle or gift box several ways.  Colors change from time to time; right now you can choose Fire Orange or Ice Blue, both very lux.

name: Fire and Ice Silk Furoshiki (small)
description: Crisp and glossy, this handwoven dupioni is incredibly easy to tie and always looks fabulous.  Small (twenty inches) is perfect for wrapping a single book, a large jewelry box or a stack of CDs.  Colors change from time to time; right now you can choose Fire Orange or Ice Blue, both very lux.  Normally $14; $12 for a limited time.

name: Fire and Ice Silk Furoshiki (pixie)
description: Crisp and glossy, this handwoven dupioni is incredibly easy to tie and always looks fabulous.  Pixie (about eleven inches) is perfect for a ring-size jewel box, or a small bottle of perfume.  Colors change from time to time; right now you can choose Fire Orange or Ice Blue, both very lux.

name: Madras Lunch Wrap (+napkin)
description: Way to go! Make bringing lunch something to look forward to, with a furoshiki specifically made for toting it. Madras patchwork exterior and napkin, with a lining of recycled pop-bottle fabric for water-resistance. Just put your various containers, fruits, etc. in the middle, knot the corners, and go to town. Adapts to contents of any shape, and gives you a clean spot for dining when it's opened. Completely washable.  Makes a thoughtful and fun gift.  (Normally $28, $23 until 2013.)

name: Truffles in Furoshiki! 5 piece sampler of Portland's own Missionary Chocolates in Vintage Sari Wrap
description:
Handcrafted, utterly delicious assortment of five dark and intense truffles from Portland's own Missionary Chocolates, with naturopathic physician Melissa Berry, ND, at the helm. Just what the doctor ordered! Vegan, dairy-free, lactose-free and gluten-free, yet freely devoured by skeptics. Made in small batches. This assortment contains: Meyer Lemon Explosion, Vanilla Salted Caramel, Perfect Espresso, Dark Chocolate Delight and very seriously Spicy Cinnamon Chipotle. Ingredients: Guittard Fair-Trade Chocolate (cacao beans, sugar, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, pure vanilla), organic coconut milk, organic brown sugar, Meyer lemon puree, California lemon oil, organic cinnamon, organic chipotle powder, organic vanilla, vanilla sea salt, organic lemon peel. Contains nuts (coconut and soy lecithin). Processed in a facility that also processes tree nuts. Gluten and dairy free.
Beautifully gift wrapped for your sweetie in our endlessly reusable  small size LuLu Wrap, with raffia trim, made from antique sari fabric. (We will choose from our selection of sari silk unless otherwise requested. Please contact us if you prefer artificial silk sari or organic cotton.) (Standard shipping for this item is USPS Priority, included in the price. If you prefer, add a note at checkout and we'll arrange Express shipping for an extra charge based on your zip code.)

name: Vintage Sari Silk Furoshiki Gift Wrap Set, 2 large
description: Wow! Each one a different print, this set of two large furoshiki is handmade of vintage sari fabric. Rather fine and feather weight; amazingly easy to knot. You will be astonished! We'll make sure you get two beautiful patterns and colors in your set, but if you have a particular wish for a certain color, or want to avoid a particular color, just drop us a note and we'll arrange it. Sample assortment shown. Raffia included. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Other sizes and fabrics are available; see the mixed size assortment, or inquire.

name: Vintage Sari Silk Furoshiki Gift Wrap Set, 2 medium
description: Wow! Each one a different print, this set of two medium furoshiki is handmade of vintage sari fabric. Rather fine and feather weight; amazingly easy to knot. You will be astonished! We'll make sure you get two beautiful patterns and colors in your set, but if you have a particular wish for a certain color, or want to avoid a particular color, just drop us a note and we'll arrange it. Sample assortment shown. Raffia included. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Other sizes are available; see the mixed size assortment, or inquire.

name: Vintage Sari Silk Furoshiki Gift Wrap Set, 6 Smalls
description: Wow! Each one a different print, this set of six small furoshiki is handmade of vintage sari fabric. Rather fine and feather weight; amazingly easy to knot. You will be astonished! We'll make sure you get a beautiful variety of patterns and colors in your assortment, but if you have a particular wish for a certain color, or want to avoid a particular color, just drop us a note and we'll arrange it. Sample assortments shown. Raffia included. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Other sizes are available; see the mixed size assortment, or inquire.

name: Vintage Sari Silk Furoshiki Gift Wrap Set, Assorted Sizes and Colors
description: Off to the races! Truly eco fabulous and global, beautiful and speedy to boot. Each one a different print, this set of two medium, three small and two pixie size furoshiki is handmade of vintage sari fabric. Rather fine and feather weight; amazingly easy to knot. You will be astonished! (We'll make sure you get a beautiful variety of patterns and colors in your assortment, but if you have a particular wish for a certain color, or want to avoid a particular color, just drop us a note and we'll arrange it. Sample assortments shown.) Raffia included, and an easy how-to card. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? A set of six smalls is also available.

name: Convertible Picnic Blanket/Tote: Madras Furoshiki with Lining, Pocket and Napkins
description: Summer made easy: what can lug your heavy groceries home, carry an al fresco dinner to a concert in the park, protect you and yours from the wet grass, and whisk it all home again? Your LuLu Wraps furoshiki! Fun cotton madras with hidden zipper pocket, recycled water resistant lining and four napkins. Full zip pocket within seam is 9" x 15", furoshiki is 45" square; knot corners to shape. Made with care in Portland, Oregon. P.S. makes a fantastic play or changing mat for Baby - goes right in the washer. Truly amazing. Custom sizes also available. Makes a great gift; we will gift wrap in a bonus furoshiki upon request, and attach a gift card with your message. No charge, and shipping is free in the US.

name: Clarity Hemp / Silk Reusable Gift Wrap
description: Beautiful on both sides: glossy outside and elegant woven texture inside. Clarity is 70% hemp and 30% silk, fairly thick and sturdy. Perfect for any occasion. Size small shown here. Larger sizes are available; just inquire. (Raffia included.) Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping?

name: Julia/Nasturtium Reusable Gift Wrap
description: Absolutely lovely. Two layers of feather-light cotton batiste, one marbled and one nasturtium orange, neatly top-stitched. This wrap is especially easy to tie to good effect; you might like to go further and explore the ideas in Chizuko Morita's book, Gift Wrapping with Textiles. Julia is also available with a Hydrangea (blue) flipside. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Julia/Hydrangea Reusable Gift Wrap
description: Absolutely lovely. Two layers of feather-light cotton batiste, one marbled and one hydrangea blue, neatly top-stitched. This wrap is especially easy to tie to good effect; you might like to go further and explore the ideas in Chizuko Morita's book, Gift Wrapping with Textiles. Julia is also available with a Nasturtium (orange) flipside. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Vintage Sari/Red Reusable Gift Wrap
description: A square of vintage art silk sari fabric, with an ornate border along one side. Delicate but strong open weave. Shown in size medium. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Hand Embroidered Lulu Wraps (Set of Five)
description: We designed these embroidered Lulu Wraps based on traditional Indian motifs, but have invited each craftswoman to improvise on the designs if she likes. Accordingly, please expect your wrap/s to be unique. The beautiful, detailed quality of the embroidery and the pride of making a skilled living are evident in each piece. Whether you use them to wrap a special gift, to play an annual part in your holiday decorations or as home decor, we know you will be delighted. Each wrap comes with raffia for tying; we suggest beginning with the whale spout style. (See 'need help with wrapping', below.) The sets include one each of our five designs, all five either small, medium or large. Assorted colors in each set. These are made to order, so please allow four to six weeks to receive them. Custom monograms or colors are easily done; just let us know by adding a note as you check out. Please note: the appetizing little parcels pictured on the tray are size 'mini' - only available as a special order, as they're a bit trickier to tie. Contact us if you're interested. Hand Embroidered wraps are also available individually. Curious about the artisans? Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Convertible Picnic Blanket/Tote: Organic Grey Cotton Furoshiki with Lining, Pocket and Napkins
description: Summer made easy! What can lug your heavy groceries home, carry an al fresco dinner to a concert in the park, protect you and yours from the wet grass, and whisk it all home again? Your LuLu Wraps furoshiki! Organic cotton with hidden zipper pocket, recycled water resistant lining and four napkins. Full zip pocket within seam is 9" x 15", furoshiki is 45" square; knot corners to shape. Made with care in Portland, Oregon. P.S. makes a fantastic play or changing mat for Baby - goes right in the washer. Truly amazing. Custom sizes also available. Makes a great gift; we will gift wrap in a bonus furoshiki upon request, and attach a gift card with your message. No charge, and shipping is free in the US.

name: Jane Reusable Gift Wrap
description: Gorgeous, deluxe ecru silk printed with terracotta, sage green and gold. It rustles. Ties delightfully. Thin but not sheer, crisp rather than drapey. Equally suitable for gifts or for wearing. Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Need help with wearing your wrap? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Hand Embroidered Lulu (Individual Pieces)
description: We designed these embroidered Lulu Wraps based on traditional Indian motifs, but have invited each craftswoman to improvise on the designs if she likes. Accordingly, please expect your wrap/s to be unique. The beautiful, detailed quality of the embroidery and the pride of making a skilled living are evident in each piece. Whether you use them to wrap a special gift, to play an annual part in your holiday decorations or as home decor, we know you will be delighted. Each wrap comes with raffia for tying. We suggest the super easy whale-spout technique for beginners. Please make your choice of the five designs, then either small, medium or large. Assorted colors; send a note with your order if you have a preference. These are made to order, so please allow four to six weeks to receive them. Custom monograms or colors are easily done; just let us know. Curious about the artisans? Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available designs and sizes. (Listed in order shown.)

name: Regency Reusable Gift Wrap
description: Smooth, sturdy cotton, in a timeless cream and grey print. We'll a yard of your choice of grosgrain ribbon: red, black or green. (Just use send us a note via the 'contact' button.) Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Tracy Reusable Gift Wrap
description: If you are into uber-subtle Japanese cottons or fine Italian shirting, you will love this wrap! Coffee black background fabric with plum, green, blue and amber pattern. Reverse is just as beautiful, with the clipped weft threads in tufts. Shown here in small with our Heirloom Grosgrain Ribbon (moss) and Manila Mesh Ribbon (amber). Need help with sizing? Need help with wrapping? Click below to see available sizes.

name: Red Manila Twine, 25 yards
description: A twenty-five yard spool of red manila twine, also called abaca. This comes from a species of banana native to the Philippines; the twine is produced by Distant Village, a company devoted to producing eco-friendly packaging in a sustainable, fair trade way, Green America Approved. The twine is similar to a twisted paper, and can also be untwisted to a ribbon about an inch thick. Looks good with every wrap.

name: Red Waxed Flower, a fair trade, coconut shell accessory
description: Our vivacious coconut shell flower, hand carved in the Philippines, comes with tying cord. 3 1/4" across. This can also be used as a belt buckle or hair ornament. It's produced as part of a fair trade, sustainable employment project. Note: the flower is coated with paraffin wax as a natural way to seal the finish.

name: Manila Mesh Ribbon/Natural, 1.5" wide, per 5 yards
description: A 1.5" wide roll of glossy, open mesh manila ribbon, also called abaca or sinamay. Exquisitely moldable, it is most often seen on fancy hats, but we like it on packages. From Distant Village, Green America approved. We cut to order. Sold in lengths of five yards; multiple lengths will be shipped as a continuous roll, up to twenty-five yards. Example: to order fifteen yards, enter order quantity "3". Special offer! Order four lengths, and we will add another for free. Get twenty-five yards for the price of twenty ($10). Manila Mesh also available in: 1.5" Amber $2.50; 5.75" Aqua, Hot Pink or Natural $3.50. Look for them in our Ribbons section!

name: Fifteen Manila Tags
description:
Large manila tags with reinforced holes and string ties. Set of 15.


<i>Shown with our Red Manila Twine</

name: Manila Mesh Ribbon/Amber, 1.5" wide, per 5 yards
description: A 1.5" wide roll of glossy, open mesh manila ribbon, also called abaca or sinamay. Exquisitely moldable, it is most often seen on fancy hats, but we like it on packages. Cut to order. From Distant Village, Green America Approved.Sold in lengths of five yards; multiple lengths will be shipped as a continuous roll (up to twenty-five yards). Example: to order fifteen yards, order quantity '3'. Special offer! Order four lengths, and we will add another for free. Get twenty-five yards for the price of twenty ($10). Manila Mesh also available in: 1.5" Natural $2.50; 5.75" Aqua, Natural or Hot Pink $3.50. Look for them in our Ribbons section!

name: Manila Mesh Ribbon/Natural, Hot Pink or Aqua, 5.75" wide, per 5 yards
description: 5.75" wide glossy, open mesh manila hemp ribbon, also called abaca or sinamay. Exquisitely moldable, it is most often seen on fancy hats, but we like it on packages. Cut to order. Note: this is made as part of a village self-employment project, and made by hand. Consequently, pieces are sometimes of irregular lengths in a roll. Sold in lengths of five yards. (Example: to order fifteen yards, select quantity '3'.) Special offer! Order four lengths, and we will add another for free. Get twenty-five yards for the price of twenty ($14). Manila Mesh also available in: 5.75" Aqua or Natural ($3.50/yd); 1.5" Amber or Natural ($2.50/yd). Look for them in our Ribbons section! Also in set w/ pink sprig, medium.

name: Heirloom Grosgrain Ribbon, 1.5" wide, per 5 yards
description: Five yards of lustrous grosgrain ribbon, 1.5" wide. Modern old-school finery, made of cotton and rayon with the traditional slight ribbed texture found in vintage hat bands. (Note: cream is temporarily sold out.) We cut to order. Sold in lengths of 5 yards; multiple lengths in the same order will be shipped as a continuous roll up to 25 yards. For example, to order 15 yards, order quantity '3'. Special offer! Order four lengths, and we will add another for free. Get 25 yards for the price of 20 ($20).
